member.name: Windows.WICGetMetadataContentSize
member.summary: Returns the size of the metadata content contained by the specified . The returned size accounts for the header and the length of the metadata.
member.param: A pointer that receives the size of the metadata content.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICMatchMetadataContent
member.summary: Obtains a metadata format GUID for a specified container format and vendor that best matches the content within a given stream.
member.param: The content stream in which to match a metadata format.
A pointer that receives a metadata format GUID for the given parameters.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: Windows.WICSerializeMetadataContent
member.summary: Writes metadata into a given stream.
member.param: The metadata writer to write metadata to the stream.
The options to use when writing the metadata.
A pointer to the stream in which to write the metadata.
member.returns: If this function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
